animations.enterFromRight: Slides in from the right with a fade effect (Radix style).
animations.enterFromLeft: Slides in from the left with a fade effect (Radix style).
animations.exitToRight: Slides out to the right with a fade effect (Radix style).
animations.exitToLeft: Slides out to the left with a fade effect (Radix style).
animations.scaleIn: Scales in with a slight 3D rotation and fade (Radix style).
animations.scaleOut: Scales out with a slight 3D rotation and fade (Radix style).
animations.slideUpAndFade: Slides up slightly and fades in (Radix style).
animations.slideRightAndFade: Slides right slightly and fades in (Radix style).
animations.slideDownAndFade: Slides down slightly and fades in (Radix style).
animations.slideLeftAndFade: Slides left slightly and fades in (Radix style).
animations.contentShow: Scales in content slightly with a fade effect (Radix style).
animations.pulse: Fades in and out, good for drawing attention.
animations.flipX: Flips the element over on the X-axis.
animations.flipY: Flips the element over on the Y-axis.
animations.swing: Swings the element back and forth like a pendulum.
animations.slideInTop: Slides the element in from the top.
animations.slideInRight: Slides the element in from the right.
animations.slideInBottom: Slides the element in from the bottom.
animations.slideInLeft: Slides the element in from the left.
animations.scaleUp: Scales the element up from a smaller size with a fade.
animations.focusPulse: Adds a pulsing box-shadow, often used for indicating focus.
animations.bounceIn: Element bounces in from scaling up.
animations.bounceInDown: Element bounces in from the top.
animations.bounceInLeft: Element bounces in from the left.
animations.bounceInRight: Element bounces in from the right.
animations.bounceInUp: Element bounces in from the bottom.
animations.bounceOutLeft: Element bounces out to the left.
animations.bounceOutRight: Element bounces out to the right.
animations.fadeInDown: Element fades and slides in from the top.
animations.fadeInLeft: Element fades and slides in from the left.
animations.fadeInRight: Element fades and slides in from the right.
animations.fadeInUp: Element fades and slides in from the bottom.
animations.fadeOutDown: Element fades and slides out downwards.
animations.fadeOutLeft: Element fades and slides out to the left.
animations.fadeOutRight: Element fades and slides out to the right.
animations.fadeOutUp: Element fades and slides out upwards.
animations.lightSpeedInRight: Element slides in from the right with a skewed speed effect.
animations.lightSpeedInLeft: Element slides in from the left with a skewed speed effect.
animations.lightSpeedOutRight: Element slides out to the right with a skewed speed effect.
animations.lightSpeedOutLeft: Element slides out to the left with a skewed speed effect.
animations.rotateIn: Element rotates in from the center.
animations.rotateInDownLeft: Element rotates in from the bottom left.
animations.rotateInDownRight: Element rotates in from the bottom right.
animations.rotateInUpLeft: Element rotates in from the top left.
animations.rotateInUpRight: Element rotates in from the top right.
animations.rotateOut: Element rotates out from the center.
animations.rotateOutDownLeft: Element rotates out downwards and to the left.
animations.rotateOutDownRight: Element rotates out downwards and to the right.
animations.rotateOutUpLeft: Element rotates out upwards and to the left.
animations.rotateOutUpRight: Element rotates out upwards and to the right.
animations.zoomIn: Element smoothly zooms in from a small size.
animations.zoomInDown: Element zooms in while sliding from the top.
animations.zoomInLeft: Element zooms in while sliding from the left.
animations.zoomInRight: Element zooms in while sliding from the right.
animations.zoomInUp: Element zooms in while sliding from the bottom.
animations.zoomOut: Element smoothly zooms out to a small size.
animations.zoomOutDown: Element zooms out while sliding downwards.
animations.zoomOutLeft: Element zooms out while sliding to the left.
animations.zoomOutRight: Element zooms out while sliding to the right.
animations.zoomOutUp: Element zooms out while sliding upwards.
animations.rollIn: Element rolls in from the left with rotation.
animations.rollOut: Element rolls out to the right with rotation.
